title: Turkish meat pide
ingredients: ['250g lean beef mince', '150ml warm water', '2 tablespoons dried active baking yeast', '1 teaspoon caster sugar', '300g plain flour', '1 teaspoon salt', '2 1/2 tablespoons olive oil', '1 tomato', '1 onion', '3 tablespoons chopped fresh parsley or 1 teaspoon dried parsley', '1 green pepper']
